name: Breakout 1980
description:
A short project I made that's intended to feel as if it's from 1980. I grew up with a ton of games from the Atari 2600 despite being only 18, and I love the aesthetic of those older games. Enjoy!

Controls:

menu control - arrow keys and enter

move paddle - W/A/S/D

launch ball - Space

Reset/new game - Enter (when in gameplay screen)

Exit to menu - Escape
